headline: Banging Their Heads Against a Brick Wall
abstract: Jonathan Waldman’s book “SAM” explores the potential of automating masonry, and the true believers who did their best to make it happen.
lead_paragraph: SAMOne Robot, a Dozen Engineers and the Race to Revolutionize the Way We BuildBy Jonathan Waldman
keywords: SAM: One Robot, a Dozen Engineers, and the Race to Revolutionize the Way We Build (Book)
